mcq.statement: Which of the following was an objective of Anjuman-e-Himayat-e-Islam?

options.b: To propagate and defend Islam against Christian missionaries and Hindu revivalists

mcq.one_liner: Anjuman-e-Himayat-e-Islam aimed to propagate and defend **Islam against Christian missionaries and Hindu revivalists**.
